comments:
I20040224
Tried the new support for showing the structure compare in the outline view and
found that it doesn't work with re-usable editors.

1. open first compare editor on a java file. the content view is updated.
2. open another re-using the existing open editor. the compare editor and
outline view is left blank.

Also, if you click on an item left over in the outline view you get the
following exception:

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Widget is disposed
at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:2625)

Thanks for trying the unannounced new feature Jean-Michel. You are a brave man too ;-)

Yes, I know about that problem and in fact that was the reason why I didn't announced it to you...
Sorry for jumping the gun then!
I'm getting this same crash in 3.2M3.
I'm taking a different approach to showing the structure in the outline so this bug is no longer valid (see bug 45247)
